messages.message:
You can run:

```
cd docs/
make build-html
```

<wait...>

Then find the output directory.. it’s in something like build/html or out/build-web/html or something

Then run:

```
python -m SimpleHTTPServer
```

And that opens up a socket on port :8080 or so
There’s a small chance you run into an error related to LaTeX not being installed on your system, but hopefully the `build-html` target avoids any code that would result in that err
(if you get it, lmk and I can walk you through the latex install)
